pullrequest.title: Logging Part 7: Playback and Record Ignition Transport Integration tests

content.raw:
~~I'm pretty sure we have a lot of tests in `ign-transport` that are likely to fail if multiple test jobs are being performed on the same machine at the same time.~~ Edit: It seems that most tests are protected by setting the partition to be a random number.

That being said, the [documentation](https://www.sqlite.org/sharedcache.html) (see the bottom section) seems to indicate that the in-memory database is only visible within the process that created it.
content.html:
I'm pretty sure we have a lot of tests in ign-transport that are likely to fail if multiple test jobs are being performed on the same machine at the same time. Edit: It seems that most tests are protected by setting the partition to be a random number.

That being said, the documentation (see the bottom section) seems to indicate that the in-memory database is only visible within the process that created it.
